title: Danniella Westbrook joins x-rated site where her fans can subscribe to see her saucy snaps
text:
Get the biggest soaps stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Danniella Westbrook is allowing her fans a chance to see her gallery of x-rated snaps if they pay a monthly fee.

The former EastEnders actress, 45, has debuted an OnlyFans account - which gives her fans access to unique racy content for just over £10 a month.

The blonde had decided to charge her followers a $13.99 subscription fee and in return they can admire her scantily-clad physique, send her special requests and exchange messages with the star which she promises to respond to.

Announcing her new venture, Danniella took to Twitter to drum up business by urging her followers to: "subscribe to my only fans right now for exclusive content."

(Image: Mike Marsland/WireImage)

She followed up with a second tweet reading: "Thanks for the requests and messages good to be in touch with you all."

Danniella, best known for her role as Sam Mitchell in the BBC soap opera EastEnders, has also pinned a link to her Twitter page to ensure any fans wanting to see her sizzling snaps can easily find the site.

On her page, the bombshell has uploaded a seductive selfie as her profile image and a close up of her ample cleavage decorates the top of the webpage.

Her bio reads: "Actress from England. Answering all DMs all day make sure to subscribe now."

It seems Danniella was recently practicing for her OnlyFans account when she shared a number of topless pictures onto Instagram .

(Image: danniellawestbrook_73/Instagram)

The mother-of-two gave fans a glimpse of her toned physique in the snap that showed her looking out of a window with her back to the camera.

She swept her blonde locks off up in her hands to expose one of her tattoos that is inked on the nape of her neck.

Danniella's scantily-clad ensemble also ensured that her other inking, which is painted on her lower back, was also in full view.

The star's peachy bottom took centre stage as she peered outside.

(Image: danniellawestbrook_73/Instagram)

Danniella Westbrook begs husband Kevin Jenkins for a divorce after five years apart.

Happy to parade her physique, Daniella also uploaded a mirror selfie of her back and bottom which she added cartoon hearts too.

Letting her fans know what she was up to, she wrote: "Bath time todays a perfect day #thewestbrook."

Danniella has spent many years going in and out of rehab, and has battled a drug addiction since playing Sam Mitchell in EastEnders when she was just 14.

She relapsed in 2012 after being clean for 12 years, and her journey to sobriety has been an uphill struggle since.

(Image: danniellawestbrook_73/Instagram)

Danniella claims she is just one relapse from dying and wants to change her life for good now.

At her lowest point, she admitted taking cocaine while pregnant with son Kai, and spent more than £250,000 on the destructive habit causing her septum to fall out.

She is now training to be a therapist so she can help other addicts turn their lives around.

Do you have a story to sell? Get in touch with us at webcelebs@trinitymirror.com or call us direct 0207 29 33033
description: The ex EastEnders actress is giving her admirers a chance to see her strip off for a fee
